sentences.sentence: Aren't you worried that your colleagues will think you have drifted into pseudoscience?
sentences.translation: 你不担心你的同僚们会认为你在搞伪科学么？

sentences.sentence: Q:Aren’t you worried that your colleagues will think you have drifted into pseudoscience?
sentences.translation: 《科学》：你不担心你的同僚们会认为你在搞伪科学么？
